data.actual_result: The status bar and URL bar are cluttered together
data.expected_result: The status bar and URL bar should be spaced out correctly as it normally is.
data.short_description: Status bar and URL bar are cluttered together (iOS 10 only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Optional: change your theme to the light theme so you can observe more easily - Find an image that is uploaded to a channel (not an embed) - Tap on the image and click on the three dots found on the top right - Tap on Open in Browser
